page.title: 05Fashion
page.content: This year teenagers are very concious of fashion. The girls wear coloured, "crocodile clips," a type of hair grip. Hair styles are dramatic in colour and cut, hair is shaved short above the ears with spiky or long wavy hair on top which is made to stick up. Long, dangling, novelty plastic earings like baseball bats, large round plates, birds and fruit are popular. Punks are particularly dramatic and they look almost like clowns. Heavy coloured makeup is used with silver lips, white faces and dark eye makeup. Necklaces and bangles are popular. "Bat wing," sleeves are common. Boys wear white and a creased effect is acheived. Individuals try to create their own particular way of dressing which expresses the way they feel and the sort of person they are.
